tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE player_profiles (
  player_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  player_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  player_email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
  player_score INTEGER
)

CREATE TABLE player_profiles (
    player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    player_email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    player_level INT,
    player_score INT
);

CREATE TABLE player_statistics (
    player_id INT,
    games_played INT,
    wins INT,
    losses INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES player_profiles(player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE player_comparisons (
    comparison_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player1_id INT,
    player2_id INT,
    comparison_result INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (player1_id) REFERENCES player_profiles(player_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (player2_id) REFERENCES player_profiles(player_id)
);
